_source.text: A few famous saints, when you come to read their life's story, don't hold up too well to modern scrutiny, but Cuthbert, while no Francis of Assisi, comes off better than most.

text: A few famous saints, when you come to read their life's story, don't hold up too well to modern scrutiny, but **Cuthbert**, while no **Francis** **of** **Assisi**, comes off **better** **than** most.
